text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: taM vivakSantam AlakSya kururAjo mahAmunim
text.ur: taṁ vivakṣantam ālakṣya kururājo mahāmunim

text.ascii: kathAsaMjananArthAya codayAm Asa pANDavaH
text.ur: kathāsaṁjananārthāya codayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ

text.ascii: bhavAn daivatadaityAnAm RSINAM ca mahAtmanAm
text.ur: bhavān daivatadaityānām r̥ṣīṇāṁ ca mahātmanām

text.ascii: rAjarSINAM ca sarveSAM caritajJaH sanAtanaH
text.ur: rājarṣīṇāṁ ca sarveṣāṁ caritajñaḥ sanātanaḥ

text.ascii: sevyaz copAsitavyaz ca mato naH kAGkSitaz ciram
text.ur: sevyaś copāsitavyaś ca mato naḥ kāṅkṣitaś ciram

text.ascii: ayaM ca devakIputraH prApto 'smAn avalokakaH
text.ur: ayaṁ ca devakīputraḥ prāpto ’smān avalokakaḥ

text.ascii: bhavaty eva hi me buddhir dRSTvAtmAnaM sukhAc cyutam
text.ur: bhavaty eva hi me buddhir dr̥ṣṭvātmānaṁ sukhāc cyutam

text.ascii: dhArtarASTrAMz ca durvRttAn RdhyataH prekSya sarvazaH
text.ur: dhārtarāṣṭrāṁś ca durvr̥ttān r̥dhyataḥ prekṣya sarvaśaḥ

text.ascii: karmaNaH puruSaH kartA zubhasyApy azubhasya ca
text.ur: karmaṇaḥ puruṣaḥ kartā śubhasyāpy aśubhasya ca

text.ascii: svaphalaM tad upAznAti kathaM kartA svid IzvaraH
text.ur: svaphalaṁ tad upāśnāti kathaṁ kartā svid īśvaraḥ

text.ascii: atha vA sukhaduHkheSu nRNAM brahmavidAM vara
text.ud: अथ वा सुखदुःखेषु नृणां ब्रह्मविदां वर
text.ur: atha vā sukhaduḥkheṣu nr̥ṇāṁ brahmavidāṁ vara

text.ascii: iha vA kRtam anveti paradehe 'tha vA punaH
text.ud: इह वा कृतमन्वेति परदेहेऽथ वा पुनः
text.ur: iha vā kr̥tam anveti paradehe ’tha vā punaḥ

text.ascii: dehI ca dehaM saMtyajya mRgyamANaH zubhAzubhaiH
text.ud: देही च देहं संत्यज्य मृग्यमाणः शुभाशुभैः
text.ur: dehī ca dehaṁ saṁtyajya mr̥gyamāṇaḥ śubhāśubhaiḥ

text.ascii: kathaM saMyujyate pretya iha vA dvijasattama
text.ud: कथं संयुज्यते प्रेत्य इह वा द्विजसत्तम
text.ur: kathaṁ saṁyujyate pretya iha vā dvijasattama

text.ascii: aihalaukikam evaitad utAho pAralaukikam
text.ur: aihalaukikam evaitad utāho pāralaukikam

text.ascii: kva ca karmANi tiSThanti jantoH pretasya bhArgava
text.ud: क्व च कर्माणि तिष्ठन्ति जन्तोः प्रेतस्य भार्गव
text.ur: kva ca karmāṇi tiṣṭhanti jantoḥ pretasya bhārgava

text.ascii: mArkaNDeya uvAca
text.ur: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca

text.ascii: tvadyukto 'yam anuprazno yathAvad vadatAM vara
text.ur: tvadyukto ’yam anupraśno yathāvad vadatāṁ vara

text.ascii: viditaM veditavyaM te sthityartham anupRcchasi
text.ur: viditaṁ veditavyaṁ te sthityartham anupr̥cchasi

text.ascii: atra te vartayiSyAmi tad ihaikamanAH zRNu
text.ur: atra te vartayiṣyāmi tad ihaikamanāḥ śr̥ṇu

text.ascii: yathehAmutra ca naraH sukhaduHkham upAznute
text.ur: yathehāmutra ca naraḥ sukhaduḥkham upāśnute

text.ascii: nirmalAni zarIrANi vizuddhAni zarIriNAm
text.ur: nirmalāni śarīrāṇi viśuddhāni śarīriṇām

text.ascii: sasarja dharmatantrANi pUrvotpannaH prajApatiH
text.ur: sasarja dharmatantrāṇi pūrvotpannaḥ prajāpatiḥ

text.ascii: amoghabalasaMkalpAH suvratAH satyavAdinaH
text.ur: amoghabalasaṁkalpāḥ suvratāḥ satyavādinaḥ

text.ascii: brahmabhUtA narAH puNyAH purANAH kurunandana
text.ur: brahmabhūtā narāḥ puṇyāḥ purāṇāḥ kurunandana

text.ascii: sarve devaiH samAyAnti svacchandena nabhastalam
text.ur: sarve devaiḥ samāyānti svacchandena nabhastalam

text.ascii: tataz ca punar AyAnti sarve svacchandacAriNaH
text.ur: tataś ca punar āyānti sarve svacchandacāriṇaḥ

text.ascii: svacchandamaraNAz cAsan narAH svacchandajIvinaH
text.ur: svacchandamaraṇāś cāsan narāḥ svacchandajīvinaḥ

text.ascii: alpabAdhA nirAtaGkA siddhArthA nirupadravAH
text.ur: alpabādhā nirātaṅkā siddhārthā nirupadravāḥ

text.ascii: draSTAro devasaMghAnAm RSINAM ca mahAtmanAm
text.ur: draṣṭāro devasaṁghānām r̥ṣīṇāṁ ca mahātmanām

text.ascii: pratyakSAH sarvadharmANAM dAntA vigatamatsarAH
text.ur: pratyakṣāḥ sarvadharmāṇāṁ dāntā vigatamatsarāḥ

text.ascii: Asan varSasahasrANi tathA putrasahasriNaH
text.ur: āsan varṣasahasrāṇi tathā putrasahasriṇaḥ

text.ascii: tataH kAlAntare 'nyasmin pRthivItalacAriNaH
text.ur: tataḥ kālāntare ’nyasmin pr̥thivītalacāriṇaḥ

text.ascii: kAmakrodhAbhibhUtAs te mAyAvyAjopajIvinaH
text.ur: kāmakrodhābhibhūtās te māyāvyājopajīvinaḥ

text.ascii: lobhamohAbhibhUtAz ca tyaktA devais tato narAH
text.ur: lobhamohābhibhūtāś ca tyaktā devais tato narāḥ

text.ascii: azubhaiH karmabhiH pApAs tiryaG narakagAminaH
text.ur: aśubhaiḥ karmabhiḥ pāpās tiryaṅ narakagāminaḥ

text.ascii: saMsAreSu vicitreSu pacyamAnAH punaH punaH
text.ur: saṁsāreṣu vicitreṣu pacyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ

text.ascii: mogheSTA moghasaMkalpA moghajJAnA vicetasaH
text.ur: mogheṣṭā moghasaṁkalpā moghajñānā vicetasaḥ

text.ascii: sarvAtizaGkinaz caiva saMvRttAH klezabhAginaH
text.ur: sarvātiśaṅkinaś caiva saṁvr̥ttāḥ kleśabhāginaḥ

text.ascii: azubhaiH karmabhiz cApi prAyazaH paricihnitAH
text.ur: aśubhaiḥ karmabhiś cāpi prāyaśaḥ paricihnitāḥ

text.ascii: dauSkulyA vyAdhibahulA durAtmAno 'pratApinaH
text.ur: dauṣkulyā vyādhibahulā durātmāno ’pratāpinaḥ

text.ascii: bhavanty alpAyuSaH pApA raudrakarmaphalodayAH
text.ur: bhavanty alpāyuṣaḥ pāpā raudrakarmaphalodayāḥ

text.ascii: nAthantaH sarvakAmAnAM nAstikA bhinnasetavaH
text.ur: nāthantaḥ sarvakāmānāṁ nāstikā bhinnasetavaḥ

text.ascii: jantoH pretasya kaunteya gatiH svair iha karmabhiH
text.ud: जन्तोः प्रेतस्य कौन्तेय गतिः स्वैरिह कर्मभिः
text.ur: jantoḥ pretasya kaunteya gatiḥ svair iha karmabhiḥ

text.ascii: prAjJasya hInabuddhez ca karmakozaH kva tiSThati
text.ur: prājñasya hīnabuddheś ca karmakośaḥ kva tiṣṭhati

text.ascii: kvasthas tat samupAznAti sukRtaM yadi vetarat
text.ur: kvasthas tat samupāśnāti sukr̥taṁ yadi vetarat

text.ascii: iti te darzanaM yac ca tatrApy anunayaM zRNu
text.ud: इति ते दर्शनं यच्च तत्राप्यनुनयं शृणु
text.ur: iti te darśanaṁ yac ca tatrāpy anunayaṁ śr̥ṇu

text.ascii: ayam AdizarIreNa devasRSTena mAnavaH
text.ur: ayam ādiśarīreṇa devasr̥ṣṭena mānavaḥ

text.ascii: zubhAnAm azubhAnAM ca kurute saMcayaM mahat
text.ur: śubhānām aśubhānāṁ ca kurute saṁcayaṁ mahat

text.ascii: AyuSo 'nte prahAyedaM kSINaprAyaM kalevaram
text.ur: āyuṣo ’nte prahāyedaṁ kṣīṇaprāyaṁ kalevaram

text.ascii: saMbhavaty eva yugapad yonau nAsty antarAbhavaH
text.ur: saṁbhavaty eva yugapad yonau nāsty antarābhavaḥ

text.ascii: tatrAsya svakRtaM karma chAyevAnugataM sadA
text.ur: tatrāsya svakr̥taṁ karma chāyevānugataṁ sadā

text.ascii: phalaty atha sukhArho vA duHkhArho vApi jAyate
text.ud: फलत्यथ सुखार्हो वा दुःखार्हो वापि जायते
text.ur: phalaty atha sukhārho vā duḥkhārho vāpi jāyate

text.ascii: kRtAntavidhisaMyuktaH sa jantur lakSaNaiH zubhaiH
text.ur: kr̥tāntavidhisaṁyuktaḥ sa jantur lakṣaṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ

text.ascii: azubhair vA nirAdAno lakSyate jJAnadRSTibhiH
text.ur: aśubhair vā nirādāno lakṣyate jñānadr̥ṣṭibhiḥ

text.ascii: eSA tAvad abuddhInAM gatir uktA yudhiSThira
text.ur: eṣā tāvad abuddhīnāṁ gatir uktā yudhiṣṭhira

text.ascii: ataH paraM jJAnavatAM nibodha gatim uttamAm
text.ur: ataḥ paraṁ jñānavatāṁ nibodha gatim uttamām

text.ascii: manuSyAs taptatapasaH sarvAgamaparAyaNAH
text.ur: manuṣyās taptatapasaḥ sarvāgamaparāyaṇāḥ

text.ascii: sthiravratAH satyaparA guruzuzrUSaNe ratAH
text.ur: sthiravratāḥ satyaparā guruśuśrūṣaṇe ratāḥ

text.ascii: suzIlAH zuklajAtIyAH kSAntA dAntAH sutejasaH
text.ur: suśīlāḥ śuklajātīyāḥ kṣāntā dāntāḥ sutejasaḥ

text.ascii: zubhayonyantaragatAH prAyazaH zubhalakSaNAH
text.ur: śubhayonyantaragatāḥ prāyaśaḥ śubhalakṣaṇāḥ

text.ascii: jitendriyatvAd vazinaH zuklatvAn mandarogiNaH
text.ur: jitendriyatvād vaśinaḥ śuklatvān mandarogiṇaḥ

text.ascii: alpabAdhaparitrAsAd bhavanti nirupadravAH
text.ur: alpabādhaparitrāsād bhavanti nirupadravāḥ

text.ascii: cyavantaM jAyamAnaM ca garbhasthaM caiva sarvazaH
text.ud: च्यवन्तं जायमानं च गर्भस्थं चैव सर्वशः
text.ur: cyavantaṁ jāyamānaṁ ca garbhasthaṁ caiva sarvaśaḥ

text.ascii: svam AtmAnaM paraM caiva budhyante jJAnacakSuSaH
text.ur: svam ātmānaṁ paraṁ caiva budhyante jñānacakṣuṣaḥ

text.ascii: karmabhUmim imAM prApya punar yAnti surAlayam
text.ur: karmabhūmim imāṁ prāpya punar yānti surālayam

text.ascii: kiM cid daivAd dhaThAt kiM cit kiM cid eva svakarmabhiH
text.ur: kiṁ cid daivād dhaṭhāt kiṁ cit kiṁ cid eva svakarmabhiḥ

text.ascii: prApnuvanti narA rAjan mA te 'stv anyA vicAraNA
text.ur: prāpnuvanti narā rājan mā te ’stv anyā vicāraṇā

text.ascii: imAm atropamAM cApi nibodha vadatAM vara
text.ur: imām atropamāṁ cāpi nibodha vadatāṁ vara

text.ascii: manuSyaloke yac chreyaH paraM manye yudhiSThira
text.ur: manuṣyaloke yac chreyaḥ paraṁ manye yudhiṣṭhira

text.ascii: iha vaikasya nAmutra amutraikasya no iha
text.ud: इह वैकस्य नामुत्र अमुत्रैकस्य नो इह
text.ur: iha vaikasya nāmutra amutraikasya no iha

text.ascii: iha cAmutra caikasya nAmutraikasya no iha
text.ud: इह चामुत्र चैकस्य नामुत्रैकस्य नो इह
text.ur: iha cāmutra caikasya nāmutraikasya no iha

text.ascii: dhanAni yeSAM vipulAni santi; nityaM ramante suvibhUSitAGgAH
text.ud: धनानि येषां विपुलानि सन्ति; नित्यं रमन्ते सुविभूषिताङ्गाः
text.ur: dhanāni yeṣāṁ vipulāni santi; nityaṁ ramante suvibhūṣitāṅgāḥ

text.ascii: teSAm ayaM zatruvaraghna loko; nAsau sadA dehasukhe ratAnAm
text.ud: तेषामयं शत्रुवरघ्न लोको; नासौ सदा देहसुखे रतानाम्
text.ur: teṣām ayaṁ śatruvaraghna loko; nāsau sadā dehasukhe ratānām

text.ascii: ye yogayuktAs tapasi prasaktAH; svAdhyAyazIlA jarayanti dehAn
text.ud: ये योगयुक्तास्तपसि प्रसक्ताः; स्वाध्यायशीला जरयन्ति देहान्
text.ur: ye yogayuktās tapasi prasaktāḥ; svādhyāyaśīlā jarayanti dehān

text.ascii: jitendriyA bhUtahite niviSTAs; teSAm asau nAyam arighna lokaH
text.ur: jitendriyā bhūtahite niviṣṭās; teṣām asau nāyam arighna lokaḥ

text.ascii: ye dharmam eva prathamaM caranti; dharmeNa labdhvA ca dhanAni kAle
text.ud: ये धर्ममेव प्रथमं चरन्ति; धर्मेण लब्ध्वा च धनानि काले
text.ur: ye dharmam eva prathamaṁ caranti; dharmeṇa labdhvā ca dhanāni kāle

text.ascii: dArAn avApya kratubhir yajante; teSAm ayaM caiva paraz ca lokaH
text.ud: दारानवाप्य क्रतुभिर्यजन्ते; तेषामयं चैव परश्च लोकः
text.ur: dārān avāpya kratubhir yajante; teṣām ayaṁ caiva paraś ca lokaḥ

text.ascii: ye naiva vidyAM na tapo na dAnaM; na cApi mUDhAH prajane yatante
text.ud: ये नैव विद्यां न तपो न दानं; न चापि मूढाः प्रजने यतन्ते
text.ur: ye naiva vidyāṁ na tapo na dānaṁ; na cāpi mūḍhāḥ prajane yatante

text.ascii: na cAdhigacchanti sukhAny abhAgyAs; teSAm ayaM caiva paraz ca nAsti
text.ud: न चाधिगच्छन्ति सुखान्यभाग्या;स्तेषामयं चैव परश्च नास्ति
text.ur: na cādhigacchanti sukhāny abhāgyās; teṣām ayaṁ caiva paraś ca nāsti

text.ascii: sarve bhavantas tv ativIryasattvA; divyaujasaH saMhananopapannAH
text.ur: sarve bhavantas tv ativīryasattvā; divyaujasaḥ saṁhananopapannāḥ

text.ascii: lokAd amuSmAd avaniM prapannAH; svadhItavidyAH surakAryahetoH
text.ur: lokād amuṣmād avaniṁ prapannāḥ; svadhītavidyāḥ surakāryahetoḥ

text.ascii: kRtvaiva karmANi mahAnti zUrAs; tapodamAcAravihArazIlAH
text.ur: kr̥tvaiva karmāṇi mahānti śūrās; tapodamācāravihāraśīlāḥ

text.ascii: devAn RSIn pretagaNAMz ca sarvAn; saMtarpayitvA vidhinA pareNa
text.ur: devān r̥ṣīn pretagaṇāṁś ca sarvān; saṁtarpayitvā vidhinā pareṇa

text.ascii: svargaM paraM puNyakRtAM nivAsaM; krameNa saMprApsyatha karmabhiH svaiH
text.ud: स्वर्गं परं पुण्यकृतां निवासं; क्रमेण संप्राप्स्यथ कर्मभिः स्वैः
text.ur: svargaṁ paraṁ puṇyakr̥tāṁ nivāsaṁ; krameṇa saṁprāpsyatha karmabhiḥ svaiḥ

text.ascii: mA bhUd vizaGkA tava kauravendra; dRSTvAtmanaH klezam imaM sukhArha
text.ud: मा भूद्विशङ्का तव कौरवेन्द्र; दृष्ट्वात्मनः क्लेशमिमं सुखार्ह
text.ur: mā bhūd viśaṅkā tava kauravendra; dr̥ṣṭvātmanaḥ kleśam imaṁ sukhārha
